text: Pierre Forgues (born June 17, 1938 in Tarbes) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Hautes-Pyrénées department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tarbes Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Pierre Forgues
